mapper.select: SELECT o.*, od.id as detail_id, od.quantity, od.price, bs.id as style_id, bs.name as style_name, bs.image_url FROM orders o LEFT JOIN order_detail od ON o.id = od.order_id LEFT JOIN box_style bs ON od.box_style_id = bs.id
